text: So like if like if, a young Pod Save America person came up to Dan, Phife Dawg.
And I was like, "Dan, I was inspired to work on campaigns because of you and Obama."
He would just be like, "that's great.
And then he'd be like, "I know, but sir, but sort of like, my mom has problems with their health insurance and I was wondering if you could, you know," "uh, yeah, that's good.
